message.body: Thank you. I'm gonna shower and go to the grocery . Do you want to go to the store with me ?
Yeah! I got some stuff at the co op but I need peppers
Ok I will text u when I'm out the shower
Okay text me when yr downstairs.
You want daylight CFLs or incandescent
And how many watts? I guess you're teaching.
I don't know the difference of cfl/incandescent

Compact fluorescent light vs light with a filament. Incandescent is much harder to find now but it used to be the standard light bulb and provides much better light IMO. I can't find daylight incandescent. How many watts do you want? Or if you don't know do you want it to be dim medium or bright
I should know that. Stuff I don't want anything over 100 watts cause I'm Working in such a tiny set.
